title: Can't buy champions
body:
Hello,

I tried to purchase udyr with IP, unfortunately i couldn't.
It told me I don't have enough RP/IP, I am level 7 almost 8 with no champions :P

I'm unsure if this is because of the new client or what.
I'm also not sure if this happened to anyone else.

Thanks,
Toast aka Tostek

Here's a video/gif
https://i.gyazo.com/eb4b0b1d11240e8d7dbcd3f2c51a5542.mp4

replies.body: Yea, so it's been over 6 months and now that the new client is out i STILL can't buy new champs. And now y'all can't tell me to go to the Legacy Client bc there is none. WANNA HELP ME OUT

This looks like a sync issue on the updated client.  Returning to the legacy client should update your balance:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher" 

That should do the trick!
